title: 5ttedit
description:
Manually set the partial volume fractions in an ACT five-tissue-type (5TT) image using mask images.



References:

cgm.title: cgm
cgm.description: provide a mask of voxels that should be set to cortical grey matter

sgm.title: sgm
sgm.description: provide a mask of voxels that should be set to sub-cortical grey matter

wm.title: wm
wm.description: provide a mask of voxels that should be set to white matter

csf.title: csf
csf.description: provide a mask of voxels that should be set to CSF

path.title: path
path.description: provide a mask of voxels that should be set to pathological tissue

none.title: none
none.description: provide a mask of voxels that should be cleared (i.e. are non-brain); note that this will supersede all other provided masks

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.title: config
items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.title: config
config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.
